content: When they've been defeated, rest up at the Mahavira Hall Shrine, but be sure to head back down the stairs to the main floor. One side has a sealed door with a lone Thunder Rhino Master and a small pot with a green Wisp in it just to the side
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Inner Courtyard'.
The content is as follows:
When they've been defeated, rest up at the Mahavira Hall Shrine, but be sure to head back down the stairs to the main floor. One side has a sealed door with a lone Thunder Rhino Master and a small pot with a green Wisp in it just to the side
